item.title: Dow closes down 800 points as bond sell-off rattles markets
item.description: The bond sell-off coincided with deficit concerns over a tax cut bill.

item.title: Trump to meet with GOP holdouts as negotiations over agenda bill falter
item.description: House Republicans have worked through the night to move a megabill advancing President Donald Trump's legislative agenda through a key committee.

item.title: What is SALT and why does it threaten Trump's 'Big Beautiful Bill?'
item.description: The future of President Donald Trump's "Big Beautiful" federal spending bill could come down to SALT tax deductions.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Freedom Caucus chair says 'no way' budget bill passes today
item.description: Freedom Caucus Chairman Andy Harris said there is “no way” the “One Big Beautiful Bill Act” passes in the House on Wednesday.

item.title: Trump confronts S. Africa's president, pushes false white genocide claims
